flawed_nl_solution:
Emma’s sister is 7 + 9 = <<7+9=16>>16 years old.
In this many years, Emma’s sister will be 56 years old: 56 - 16 = <<56-16=38>>38 years.
When her sister is 56 years old, Emma will be 7 + 38 = <<7+38=45>>45 years.
#### 45

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 38. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
